title: 美司法呼籲法官不要失民眾信任　港司法呼籲公眾珍惜法治自由有限

replies.msg:

筆者記得今年年初讀過 CNN 報道，美國首席大法官 John Roberts 在年度報告中警告大家不要當民主理所當然（take democracy for granted），又呼籲法官做好工作，不要令司法失去民眾信任，否則可能令民主受損。然後就想起香港司法界一天到晚訓斥民眾不信任司法是破壞法治，還有之前一位終院法官退休時又大講甚麼大家要用好選票和言論自由云云，唔知仲以為香港先係民主國家，美國至係民主危在旦夕！



https://edition.cnn.com/2019/12/31/politics/john-roberts-judiciary-democracy/index.html

Chief Justice John Roberts urged his fellow federal judges Tuesday to promote confidence in the judiciary and maintain the public's trust.

Americans, Roberts said, have in the modern era come to "take democracy for granted,"

"We should reflect on our duty to judge without fear of favor, deciding each matter with humility, integrity and dispatch," Roberts wrote and added that judges should "do our best to maintain the public's trust that we are faithfully discharging our solemn obligation to equal justice under the law."
